summary:
This mod makes the blessings given by altars last for 168 hours (one week) of 
in game time.
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes the blessings given by altars last for 168 hours (one week) of 
in game time.

===Install===

Extract the .esp file to your Skyrim Data folder.

===Uninstall===

Delete the .esp file from your Skyrim Data folder.

===Credits===

MrRichter - for his original Permanent Blessing mod
author: Shadow5973
